Derek Tucker","description":"An matlab implementation of the multivariate Bayesian regression (mvBayes) framework. Decomposes a multivariate/functional response using a user-specified orthogonal basis decomposition, and then models each basis component independently using an arbitrary user-specified (univariate) Bayesian regression model.
